title: Transcendentalist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Transcend (Day, 3 use): Choose a player. They will transcend humanity tonight causing anything that should happen to them tonight to not happen - all visits will fail, all kills will fail, all abilities will fail including those that resolve at the beginning of the night. They will remain transcended the following day causing any day abilities targeting them to fail. They will also be unable to do anything during this phase (they are essentially dead but are presented as alive).
- Ascension (Night, 1 use): Deal an Unstoppable Attack to the player that you used Begone on last night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - A transcended player will still count towards voting majority.

desc:
Post 1073
*Elevate your soul to another plane of existence today!*
